alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 1:01PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FIRE DANGER STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... The combination of dry fuels, low relative humidity, and gusty winds will lead to increased fire danger on Saturday. Relative humidity values will drop to 25 to 30 percent. Please refer to your local burn permitting authorities on whether you can burn today. If you do burn, you are advised to use extreme caution.mph.
info.instruction: Please refer to your local burn permitting authorities on whether you can burn. If you do, you are advised to use extreme caution.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
